Ability.Name: Mangle
Shred
Ability.Lua:
local hasTarget = UnitExists("Target")
if hasTarget == nil then return false else local Hostile = UnitIsEnemy("Target", "Player") local isDead = UnitIsDead("Target") if Hostile and not isDead then local facing = PQR_UnitFacing("Target", "Player") if facing == false or not PQR_NotBehindTarget() then local CP = GetComboPoints("Player", "Target") if CP < 5 then return true else return false end end end end

Ability.Name: Rejuvination
Ability.Lua:
local inCombat = UnitAffectingCombat("Player") local playerHP = 100 * UnitHealth("Player") / UnitHealthMax("Player") local level = UnitLevel("Player") local hasRejuv = UnitBuffID("Player", 774)
if inCombat ~= nil and not IsMounted() and level < 85 and playerHP < 90 and not hasRejuv then return true end

Ability.Name: Cat Form
Feral Charge
Ability.Lua:
local hasTarget = UnitExists("Target")
if hasTarget == nil then return false else local chargeCD = GetSpellCooldown(49376) local Hostile = UnitIsEnemy("Target", "Player") local isDead = UnitIsDead("Target") local inCombat = UnitAffectingCombat("Player") local inRange = IsSpellInRange(tostring(GetSpellInfo(49376)), "Target") if not inCombat and inRange and chargeCD == 0 and Hostile and not isDead then return true end end

Ability.Name: Prowl
Ability.Lua:
local hasTarget = UnitExists("Target")
if hasTarget == nil then return false else local prowlCD = GetSpellCooldown(5215) local Hostile = UnitIsEnemy("Target", "Player") local isDead = UnitIsDead("Target") local inCombat = UnitAffectingCombat("Player") if inCombat == nil and prowlCD == 0 and Hostile and not isDead then return true end end

Ability.Name: Rip
Ability.Lua:
local hasTarget = UnitExists("Target")
if hasTarget == nil then return false else local Hostile = UnitIsEnemy("Target", "Player") local isDead = UnitIsDead("Target") local inCombat = UnitAffectingCombat("Player") local playerLevel = UnitLevel("Player") if playerLevel < 85 then local CP = GetComboPoints("Player", "Target") local enemyLevel = UnitLevel("Target") if Hostile and CP > 3 then return true end elseif playerLevel == 85 then local rip, _, _, _, _, _, riptimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 1079, "PLAYER") local ripCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target") local riphealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") if rip ~= nil then if riphealth > 60 then if ripCP == 5 then if riptimer - GetTime() <4 then return true end end end else if ripCP == 5 then return true end end end end

Ability.Name: -- Rotation Switcher --
Ability.Lua:
local playerLevel = UnitLevel("Player")
if playerLevel < 85 then local talentTree = GetPrimaryTalentTree() local knownPul = IsSpellKnown(80313)
if talentTree == 1 then PQR_SwapRotation("Leveling Mode - Balance DPS (HonorBuddy Druid DPS)") elseif talentTree == 2 and not knownPul then PQR_SwapRotation("Leveling Mode - Feral DPS (HonorBuddy Druid DPS)") elseif talentTree == 2 and knownPul then PQR_SwapRotation("Leveling Mode - Feral Tank (HonorBuddy Druid DPS)") elseif talentTree == 3 then PQR_SwapRotation("Leveling Mode - Healing (HonorBuddy Druid DPS)") end elseif playerLevel == 85 then local talentTree = GetPrimaryTalentTree() local knownPul = IsSpellKnown(80313)
if talentTree == 1 then PQR_SwapRotation("Raid Mode - Balance DPS (HonorBuddy Druid DPS)") elseif talentTree == 2 and not knownPul then PQR_SwapRotation("Raid Mode - Feral DPS (HonorBuddy Druid DPS)") elseif talentTree == 2 and knownPul then PQR_SwapRotation("Raid Mode - Feral Tank (HonorBuddy Druid DPS)") elseif talentTree == 3 then PQR_SwapRotation("Raid Mode - Healing (HonorBuddy Druid DPS)") end end

Ability.Name: Rake
Ravage!
Ability.Lua:
local stamp = UnitBuffID("Player", 81022)
if stamp ~= nil then local soundState = GetCVar("Sound_EnableSFX") CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(6785))) SetCVar("Sound_EnableSFX", soundState) end

Ability.Name: Pounce
Mark of the Wild
Ability.Lua:
local inCombat = UnitAffectingCombat("Player") local isKnown = IsSpellKnown(1126) local hasMotW = UnitBuffID("Player", 79061)
if not hasMotW and not inCombat and isKnown then return true end

Ability.Name: Maim
Insta Healing
Ability.Lua:
local regrowthKnown = IsSpellKnown(8936) local knownHT = IsSpellKnown(5185) local playerHP = 100 * UnitHealth("Player") / UnitHealthMax("Player")
if regrowthKnown and not knownHT then local psBuff = UnitBuffID("Player", 69369)
if psBuff ~= nil and playerHP < 60 then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(8936))) elseif psBuff ~= nil then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(8936))) elseif psBuff == nil and playerHP < 40 then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(8936))) end elseif knownHT then local psBuff = UnitBuffID("Player", 69369)
if psBuff ~= nil and playerHP < 60 then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(5185))) elseif psBuff ~= nil then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(5185))) elseif psBuff == nil and playerHP < 40 then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(5185))) end end

Ability.Name: Dash
Savage Roar
Tiger's Fury
Ability.Lua:
--Functions --Buffs local _,_,_,TF = UnitBuffID("player", 5217) local stamp = UnitBuff("player", "Stampede") --Cooldowns local TFstart, TFduration = GetSpellCooldown(5217) local TFcooldown = (TFstart + TFduration - GetTime()) --Energy Checks local tfEnergy = UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") * 100
--if TF ~= nil then -- return false --else -- if TFcooldown > 0 then -- return false -- else -- if stamp ~= nil then -- return false -- else -- if tfEnergy < 45 then -- return true -- end -- end -- end --end
local BSstart, BSduration = GetSpellCooldown(50334) local BScooldown = (BSstart + BSduration - GetTime())
if BScooldown < 5 then if BSstart ~= 0 then return false end end
if BScooldown > 25 and tfEnergy <= 45 then return true end
if BSstart == 0 and tfEnergy <= 45 then return true end

Ability.Name: Berserk
Ability.Lua:
--Functions local PQR_FireBoss = PQR_FireBoss("Target") --Buffs local _,_,_,TF = UnitBuffID("player", 5217) local _, _, _, BS = UnitBuffID("player", 50334) local BSstart, BSduration = GetSpellCooldown(50334) --Cooldowns local BScooldown = (BSstart + BSduration - GetTime()) --Energy/Health/Level Checks local bsEnergy = UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") * 100 local bsHealth = UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") * 100 local levelcheck = UnitLevel("target")
if TF == nil then return false else -- if BScooldown > 0 and (PQR_FireBoss == true) then if BScooldown > 0 then return false else -- if bsHealth < 96 then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(50334))) -- end end end

Ability.Name: -- Load Lua --
Ability.Lua: if PQR_RotationStarted == true then PQR_RotationStarted = false if PQR_LoadLua ~= nil then if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_Firepong.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("Put the file PQR_Firepong.lua in the Data file for this profile to work properly!!!", "Error") PQR_RotationStop() return true end end end

Ability.Name: Faerie Fire (Feral)
Moonfire
Ability.Lua:
PQR_ResetMovementTime = 0.25 local hasTarget = UnitExists("Target") local isDead = UnitIsDead("Target")
if hasTarget and not isDead then local mf = UnitDebuffID("Target", 8921) local mf2 = UnitDebuffID("Mouseover", 8921) local solar = UnitBuffID("player", 48517) local MFfocus, _, _, _, _, _, mfiretimer = UnitDebuffID("Focus", 8921) local MO = UnitExists("Mouseover") local isTalented = select(5,GetTalentInfo(1,16))
if not isTalented then if mf == nil then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(8921)),"Target") CastSpellByID(8921, "Target") elseif MFfocus == nil then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(8921)),"Focus") CastSpellByID(8921, "Focus") elseif MO then if mf2 == nil then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(8921)),"Mouseover") CastSpellByID(8921, "Mouseover") end elseif PQR_IsMoving(.25) then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(8921)),"Target") CastSpellByID(8921, "Target") end elseif isTalented then if mf == nil and solar == nil then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(8921)),"Target") CastSpellByID(8921, "Target") elseif MFfocus == nil and solar == nil then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(8921)),"Focus") CastSpellByID(8921, "Focus") elseif MO then if mf2 == nil and solar == nil then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(8921)),"Mouseover") CastSpellByID(8921, "Mouseover") end elseif PQR_IsMoving(.25) then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(8921)),"Target") CastSpellByID(8921, "Target") end end end

Ability.Name: Wrath/StarFire
-- Load --
Ability.Lua: if PQR_RotationStarted == true then PQR_RotationStarted = false PQR_AddToSpellDelayList(0, 0, .75) --All Spell's Without ID's PQR_AddToSpellDelayList(2912, 0, 3) --Starfire PQR_AddToSpellDelayList(5176, 0, .75) --Wrath end

Ability.Name: Starsurge
Ability.Lua:
local hasTarget = UnitExists("Target") local isDead = UnitIsDead("Target") local starKnown = IsSpellKnown(78674)
if hasTarget and not isDead and starKnown then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(78674))) end
